Example 2
Situation
:  Same facts as in Example 1.  Examination reveals tuberculosis was inactive as of May 10, 2003.
Result
:  Continue the 100-percent evaluation for two years after the date of inactivity, followed by graduated reduction to 50 percent thereafter for four years.  Reduce to 30 percent from May 10, 2009, and thereafter based on far advanced lesions.
